channel.title: EWS | Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Quantifying Recurrences in State Space
item.description:
Today's Topics:

  • Unordered categorical time series:
    • (Cross-) Recurrence Quantification Analysis
  • Continuous time series:
    • Delay-embedding & Phase space reconstruction
    • Analysis of leader-follower behavior and coupling direction

Time table for Day 2

When What Topics Notes
09.15-10.15 Quantifying temporal patterns in unordered categorical time series data Categorical Auto-Recurrence Quantification Analysis (RQA)
10.15-10.30 Break
10:30-11:30 Assignments Categorical RQA, Surrogate analysis
11.30-12.15 Cross-RQA of unordered categorical data
12.15-13.15 Lunch
13.15-14.00 Assignments Assignments can be made in R/JAMOVI
14.00-14.45 Quantifying temporal patterns in continuous time series data Phase-space reconstruction, EWS of phase transitions
14:45-15.00 Break
15:00-15:45 Assignments (Cross) RQA on continuous series

item.title: Network Topology and Early Warning Signals
item.description:
Today's Topics:

  • The idiographic system method in psychopathology
    • Process monitoring (experience sampling)
    • Multivariate time series
    • Dynamic complexity
  • Advanced Topics:
    • (Multiplex) Recurrence networks
    • Convergent cross-mapping

Time table for Day 3

When What Topics Notes
09.15-10.15 Dynamic complexity as an early warning signal in psychopathology Multivariate time series, Idiographic science
10.15-10.30 Break
10:30-11:45 Advanced Topics Multiplex Recurrence Networks, Convergent cross-mapping
